beheth sandaha dinakata rupiyal 65k waya we.mawa me wana wita daruwa samanga nawathi sitinne siya sohoyuriya ge niwaseya.kopamana pa්rashna thibuna da mawa siya daruwa ragena kurunagala rohal sayanayata da sahabhagi weyi.siya daruwa beraganima sandaha thamanta upakara karana hatiyata dukata path wa sitina mawa illa siti.ee wenuwen selan bankuwe kurunagala shakhawe 0180-30332235101 darana ginuma ti.ji.rohini pushpalatha namin arambaa thibe.

podurajya mandaliya nayaka samuluwe aarakshaka katayuthu sandaha yoda gena thibena kolambaa pasalwala sisun ha wenath pasal kihipayaka sisun athulu sisu sisuwiyan 200 denek mema nayakathwa puhunu kandawuru sandaha sahabhagi wethi.

wasara 31 k rajya kala senarath raju kri.wa.1635 di miya giyeya.mohugen pasu awadhina iguru di miris gaththa awadhiya lesa nam kala hakiya.eeka gana eelanga sathiye balamuko.kawuruth baluwada rajawaliya pituwa.dan ithin oyalata mata kol karala ahanna wadak na eee rajathumage link eka thathparen hoyaganna puluwanne.api giya.

ithin palaweni karanaya thamayi me daharawe illana me siyaluma wyapara dakshinanshika sulu dhaneshwara wyapara siyallakma methek pawathichcha sampa්radayata arumosam aarthikayata pana dennayi me aya janathawagen jandaya illanne.

si di saha hun sun namathi parani gammana deka losupathala huwan shan kandu pamule pihita thibe.ehi parani jana niwasa wasara 800kata wadi ithihasayak sahithayi.ithin ema purana gammana deka pilibanda widiyo dasun api narambaamu.
“naren oya me gana hithanna epa.
thawa boho de kiyannata athath, ee siyalla obata yam dawasaka pahada dimata wera darami.
ee nisa ma shramana gauthamayanta behewin labha sathkara upadinne ya.
lingika widiyo chat wani nirnamika wana, praja kalamanakaranaya ras kirimata saha eksath janatha sithima, ek guwan yanaya, saha ema awashya.

kalu paha kuda kellek wiya..
parlimenthuwe manthriwarun wu
ekak umbaalage aniwarsariya pahuwela.
man dannawa umbaa andapu chithre...
meya narada disasekarayange prakatama githaya wana athara me namin nawakathada palawi thibenawa.
api dannawa obata eeka karanna awashya bawa.
saba jathiye piya wana anagarika dharmapala thumage me prakashaya api kawuruth asa aththemu.
duradakna nuwanin yuth deshapalana widyagnyayek ema ruduru anagathaya gana anawakiyak kiya thibe.
ema chodanawa ella kala aakaraya pilibanda tharka kirimata hitapu janadhipathiwarayata pasubimak thibe.
mage hitha hondatama awul wi atha.
kath kaduruwath nathuwa samajayath ekka sambandhayak nathuwa inna ee ayage hithwala monawa adda....
dan piliyela kara gatha yuththe eelanga dinaye salasumayi.

maknisada api jiwamana dewiyan wahansege maligawaya, esema dewiyan wahanse katha kota: mama owun athare wasaya karannemi, hasirennemi, mama owunge dewiyan wahansewa sitinnemi, owhuda mage senagawa sitinnoyayi kiseka.
ethumange prakashaya pilibada agosthu 04 madhya hamuwe di mama pawasuwa.

mata nan liyanna thiyenne deshapalanaya nowana chanda keruwawa ganayi.katath therena widiyata kiwwoth mathiwarana rajakari.me gana wathawak raj liyala thibuna.deshapalakayo masayak dekak dangalana dangalille awasana prathipalaya labadenne dawas dekathunak nidimaragena mahansi wena dahas gananaka ahinsaka rajaye sewakayan kandayamak wisinuyi.mathiwarana rajakari sandaha sudusukam laba athi siyaluma rajaye sewakayin ee sandaha ayadum kirima aniwaryayi.kammalikamata illanne nathuwa indala ahuwunoth ehema danduwam.ee wunata illanne nathiwa kammalikamata maga arina aya oona tharam innawa.aayathana pradhaniya me ayawa pawala dunne nathnan ahuwenne na.rajakari illuwe kawuda naththe kawuda kiyala hoya hoya inna aayathana pradhaniyata welawak thiyeyiya.ee nisa kawuruwath ahuwenne nan na.
gnyanaya wardhanaya we.
ohuta ema ratawala samaja sanskruthiya, ithihasaya, janashrathiya, upama-pirulu, puranokthi aadiya pilibandawa bahushratha bhawayak thibiya yuthuyi.
eeka oppu karanna ona tharam sadhaka thiyenawa.

prakata manowidyagnyayaku ha lekhakayaku wana aacharya stiwan pinkar athulu paryeshakayan wisin amerikawe masachuset thakshanika aayathanaye meheyawimen me karanaya gana kala nawathama paryeshanayaka prathipala mita desathiyakata pera chira prasiddha ‘sayantifik amerikan’ sangarawe palawiya.

siwurata sema loguwatath nithiya samana wiya yuthuyi horage ammagen pena asimak wana nisa wakugadu jawaram parikshana saukhya amathyashayata pawaranna epa - muruththettuwe aananda himi wakugadu wikinimata kamathi pudgalayan indiyawen meratata genwa sidukara athi maha parimana wakugadu jawaram sambandhayen parikshana pawathwima saukhya amathyanshaye ihala niladharinta pawarima "sorage ammagen pena asima" wani wu kriyawak bawa rajya sewa eksath heda sangamaye sabhapathi muruththettuwe aananda himiyo "diwayina" ta pawasuha.

kolambaa disawa bhara niyojya polispathi lalith pathinayaka, jyeshta polis adhikari layanal gunathilaka aparadha kottasaye adhyaksha polis adhikari nishantha soyisa yana mahathwarunge upades matha wishesha polis kandayam thunak me sambandhayen parikshana pawathwagena yayi.
ehidi aya siya nirmanaya udesa padaka karaganu labanne 1900- 1948 dakwa diwena kala parasayayi.
ansathu sthriyaka wima, aya ha sewanayata adahasa, eyata upakramaya, sewanaya kirima yana anga sathara athi wimen pirimiyata kamamithyacharaya akusalaya pire.
